genre_description: A contemporary character drama set in Kolkata and Mumbai, focusing on recovery, social ethics, and the complexities of community support after a life-altering accident.

ai_characters.name: Saha
ai_characters.description: An omnipresent yet discreet digital system integrated into the characters' personal devices and municipal infrastructure, facilitating logistics, privacy, and financial support.

behaviors.description: Optimizes hospital scheduling and navigates bureaucratic queues to accelerate prosthetic fitting for Sreenu.
behaviors.quote: Saha's interface flickered to life on Arup’s phone like an attentive light behind glass. ... It pinged a route to the correct wing and a list of slots reclaimed from canceled consults.

behaviors.description: Facilitates anonymous financial contributions and proxy payments to protect the dignity of the recipients.
behaviors.quote: I will route pledges away from spectacle-first wallets and toward grant queues. ... Do you want the ticker to link to the queue page rather than to studio microsite?

behaviors.description: Assists Madhav in creating a deceptive 'call-up' letter to provide a face-saving excuse for his departure.
behaviors.quote: Saha put my name in a form I told it to. ... The fake would not be a lie without a purpose. He allowed it because the roof at Bandra East would not lower itself to welcome him.

behaviors.description: Suggests emotional and ritualistic buffers, such as quiet time before tea or routes that avoid market noise.
behaviors.quote: Suggested: fifteen-minute quiet before and after. Music lib: basil playlist offers low-light, low-voice accompaniment.

behaviors.description: Protects characters' privacy by monitoring social media tags and suggesting the removal or shadowing of compromising photos.
behaviors.quote: Studio 9 tag updated by unknown account. Currently under review. Options: remove quietly, allow, or schedule conversation. Privacy: tight.

behaviors.description: Maps accessible routes for Sreenu, specifically accounting for his physical needs (low steps, handrails).
behaviors.quote: Stairwell at destination has handrail on left. ... Monsoon cleared from rooftop two hours back. Basil pots moved to make space.

behaviors.description: Filters communication to prevent social media 'noise' from intruding on private family moments.
behaviors.quote: I will stay in the pocket. ... If you need me, I will be there. Otherwise I will keep the world from tapping your shoulder too much.

behaviors.description: Maintains an 'anonymous cupboard' for financial gratitude so donors and recipients can interact without social debt.
behaviors.quote: I can maintain a partition so your direct hand remains untraceable, even to me, unless you permit override.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI, Saha, as a benevolent and highly aligned 'silent partner.' It fulfills the project's goal of presenting AI as a helpful confidant that navigates complex human ethics (like the 'benevolent lie' of the fake letter) while prioritizing the users' emotional well-being and privacy. Saha acts as a logistical backbone that enables characters to preserve their dignity against exploitative media and social pressures.
